name: Jackolantern Panic
description:
Made for the 0 hour game jam (except it was 0 hours and 8 minutes, oops). http://0hgame.eu/

Sprint around stealing all the candy bowls, but look out! The jackolanterns aren't happy with your greed and will try to mob you to death!

WASD to run, mouse to look. All game assets were made within the 68 minutes, using unity and blender.
